title: White Vases
description: White Vases (CC#26) is a 21-page poetry chapbook featuring 18 works by John Swain of Louisville, Kentucky. Saddle stitched using high quality white and blue cardstock. Released June 1st 2012, White Vases is now available for $5 (plus $1.50 postage) from Crisis Chronicles Press, 3344 W. 105th Street #4, Cleveland, Ohio 44111.
author: John  Swain
